alert.note: Alert for Portage; Waupaca; Waushara; Wood (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 8:51PM CDT until July 28 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: The National Weather Service in Green Bay has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Wood County in central Wisconsin... Southern Portage County in central Wisconsin... Waushara County in central Wisconsin... Southwestern Waupaca County in northeastern Wisconsin... * Until 930 PM CDT. * At 850 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northeast of Friendship, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Waupaca, Wautoma, Redgranite, Plainfield, Chain O` Lakes-King, Napowan Scout Camp, Hartman Creek State Park, Lake Wazeecha, Silver Lake and Weyauwega. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Green Bay. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
